Landscape.name: photo.landscape
Landscape.message: The landscape are there, and I just take them thoroughly.

Animal.name: photo.animal
Animal.message: If you want to be a better animal photographer, stand in front of more animals.

Portrait.name: photo.portrait
Portrait.message: The whole point of taking portraits is so that I can see how far people have come.

Others.message: The Earth is art, The photographer is only a witness.

SnapShot.name: photo.snapshot
SnapShot.message: It is more important to click with people than to click the shutter.

Live Composite.name: photo.livecomposite
Live Composite.message: Since Iâ€™m inarticulate, I express myself with images.

Pinhole/Film.name: photo.pinfilm
Pinhole/Film.message: Seeing is not enough, you have to feel what you photograph

->Back.message: What you see is what you get.
